UnusedPrivateProperty:HistoryListItem.kt$val relativeTime = when { daysAgo == 0 -> "Today" daysAgo == 1 -> "Yesterday" daysAgo < 30 -> "$daysAgo days ago" daysAgo < 365 -> { val months = daysAgo / 30 if (months <= 1) "1 month ago" else "$months months ago" } else -> { val years = daysAgo / 365 if (years <= 1) "1 year ago" else "$years years ago" } }
